title: Mac FPS issues
body:
i have a mid 2012 macbook pro 13'
specs are:
2.5GHz i5
8Gb ram (just upgraded)
intel HD graphics 4000
OS x El Captian

i have 0 lag until a team fight, or more champs enter lane, at that point my fps drops anywhere from 5-20 fps, from a usual 100+ fps...
all apps are closed and besides microsoft office 2011 it is the only application i have installed... any help?

replies.body: The tips outlined by the troubleshooting guide are all valid useful tidbits. But can you tell me why performance on the macs takes such a hit in team battles compared to running the game on the same machine in windows?

FPS issues on a Mac are generally caused by a small handful of potential causes. The most frequent are weird interactions at the System Management Controller (SMC) or at the NVRAM. Generally, a reset of either of those can help, but corrupt or missing game files can also be at play here. We've consolidated the most common solutions for this in our [FPS troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#section-mac)

Let me know if you still have FPS issues after working through the steps in that guide.
